    Rang Liu

    Dalian University of Technology

    • Ph.D. student
    • Dalian, China
    • Email
    • ResearchGate
    • Google Scholar

    I received the B.S. degree in electronics information engineering from Dalian University of Technology, Dalian, China, in 2018. I am now studying toward the Ph.D. degree with the School of Information and Communication Engineering, Dalian University of Technology, Dalian, China. My current research interests are focused on signal processing, massive MIMO systems, reconfigurable intelligent surfaces, and integrated sensing and communication. My advisor is Prof. Ming Li.
